subject: Re: [junit] Code Generators
msgSnippet: ... I don t understand the question. At a minimum, you have to hand-write the expected results, because no computer knows what you expect. Usually the expected
messageBody:
computing_skills wrote:

> I'm using Oracle JDeveloper 9i (9.0.4 build) and have a series of
> java classes I'd like to test but is their an easier way to test
> them than have to hand write the tests?

I don't understand the question. At a minimum, you have to hand-write
the expected results, because no computer knows what you expect. Usually
the expected result is the most difficult part of the test.

What are you hoping to find?
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
